entity.name: Condition_assesment
entity.description: The cumulative result of evaluating all the criteria involved in the condition, in the context of a subject target. The result is derived following the rules of evaluating the logical expressions of a compound criteria.

entity.name: Criterion_evaluation
entity.description: The evaluation record of each criterion element invovled in a condition.

explicit.name: criterion_evaluated
explicit.description: The criterion that is being evaluated.

explicit.name: value_record
explicit.description: The recorded value of a parameter that is evaluated. The parameter value template can be instanciated through the Parameter associated to the criterion under evaluation.

entity.name: Item_evaluated
entity.description: A recording of the object being evaluated. The object is identified by its host entity name and the identifier vlaue. The object must be within scope of the Condition_context. The Condition_context also serves as a reference path for locating an object subject to evaluation.

explicit.name: host_entity
explicit.description: The entity name within a schema of ISO 10303, to which the subject of evaluation belongs.

explicit.name: item_identifier
explicit.description: The identifier of the obejct evaluated.
